name: Idle Nature
description:
This game is combined with "idle" and "2Dstrategy".

It is designed as a world where the dying "Tree" stands by itself. You can develop Tree by putting some units such as "Root" and "Pump". Then, you should purify "Wasteland" by attacking. Tree get level up and the world will be clean.

Idle Nature is prototype game. 
So please join discord server, and leave any feedbacks.
https://discord.gg/fHdc54kEpk
